price: Watasema: (Ufalme huo) ni wa Mwenyezi Mungu. Sema: Basi vipi mnadanganyika?
footnotes: Watakiri kuwa hakika huyo ni Mwenyezi Mungu. Waambie: Basi huwaje mkadanganyika kwa pumbao na kuchochewa na mashetani, na mkaacha ut'iifu wa Mwenyezi Mungu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
